problem.markdown:
A gas is contained in a cylinder piston arrangement. The gas is heated as a result of which its temperature increases and the piston moves by some distance. This system can be classified as (x) Control mass ( ) Control volume ( ) Both control mass and control volume ( ) Cannot be classified
[explanation] It is a closed system and hence a control mass system. [explanation]
problem.p: A gas is contained in a cylinder piston arrangement. The gas is heated as a result of which its temperature increases and the piston moves by some distance. This system can be classified as

choicegroup.choice: Both control mass and control volume

div.p: It is a closed system and hence a control mass system.
